revised_title: An Account of Dr. Bianchini's Recueil d'Experiences Faites à Venise sur le Medicine Electrique
tldr: The author provides a detailed account of Dr. Bianchini's experiments on medical electricity and odor transmission conducted in Venice. The experiments tested the effects of various substances on individuals during electrical stimulation, with inconclusive results regarding the transmission of odors and the efficacy of certain medicines.
